ActExcise Act, 2001
SubjectExcise Duties on Vaping Products Regulations
PrecisEXCISE DUTIES ON VAPING PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish rules relating to the additional vaping duties that are used in determining the amount of the additional duty imposed on vaping products in respect of the coordinated provinces and territories under various sections of the Act; (2) specify the circumstances in which the additional vaping duty additional vaping duty would be imposed if the vaping products are for consumption, use or sale to consumers in a coordinated province or territory, for vaping products that are imported by an individual for their personal use, an additional duty would be imposed if the individual is resident in a coordinated province or territory; (3) set out that the additional vaping duty would apply in respect of any vaping product that is stamped on or after July 1, 2024, or that is imported or released under the Customs Act on or after that day, to facilitate the implementation of additional vaping duties in respect of the coordinated provinces and territories; and (4) provide for a three-month transition period during which vaping products that are stamped before July 1, 2024, or that are imported or released under the Customs Act before that day, may be disposed of, sold, offered for sale, purchased and possessed up until September 30, 2024; (5) make related amendments to various other regulations in respect of the federal excise duty framework on vaping products.
